metadata.title: FIECON — International Business Consulting
metadata.description: FIECON Germany Co. KG — International business consulting for corporate law, company formations, financial administration and construction finance. Offices in Hamburg, Belgrade and Texas.

hero.headline: International Consulting Excellence
hero.subtitle: Corporate law, company formations and financial administration — with presence in Hamburg, Belgrade and Texas.

about.headline: Excellence in international consulting
about.text_1: FIECON Germany Co. KG for International Consulting Industries combines deep expertise in corporate law with international reach. From our offices in Hamburg, Belgrade and Texas, we support businesses expanding across borders.
about.text_2: Our team delivers tailored solutions for complex challenges — from international company formations to financial administration and specialized sectors like construction finance and yacht building.
about.quote: Excellence in international consulting — from day one.

services.headline: Our Expertise
services.subtitle: Tailored consulting for your international business ventures.

consulting.title: Business Consulting
consulting.description: Strategic consulting in corporate law and international company formations. We guide you from conception to successful implementation.

finance.title: Financial Administration
finance.description: Professional management and optimization of your finances. Transparent processes and strategic planning for sustainable growth.

construction.title: Construction Finance
construction.description: Specialized financing solutions for construction projects. From planning to completion — we secure your investments.

yacht.title: Yacht Construction Finance
yacht.description: Exclusive financing consulting for yacht building. Tailored solutions for a demanding market segment.

expertise.title: International Expertise
expertise.description: In-depth knowledge of legal systems and business practices across Europe, the USA and Southeast Europe.

personal.title: Personal Attention
personal.description: Every mandate receives individual attention. We understand your goals and develop tailored strategies.

trust.title: Trusted Partnership
trust.description: Long-term relationships built on transparency, integrity and proven results.

offices.headline: Globally positioned
offices.subtitle: Three locations, one mission — international consulting at the highest level.

contact.headline: Let's talk
contact.subtitle: We look forward to your inquiry and are happy to advise you on your project.

dialog.title: Send Message
dialog.panel_subtitle: We look forward to your inquiry and will get back to you promptly.
dialog.name: Name
dialog.subject: Subject
dialog.success_text: Thank you! We will get back to you shortly.
dialog.error_text: The message could not be sent. Please try again.

footer.description: FIECON Germany Co. KG for International Consulting Industries — Your partner for international business consulting.
footer.copyright: © {year} FIECON Germany Co. KG. All rights reserved.

datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.intro: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously.
datenschutz.section_2_title: 2. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
datenschutz.section_2_text: When visiting our website, information of a general nature is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your internet service provider and similar details. This is exclusively information that does not allow any conclusions about your person.
datenschutz.section_3_text: If you contact us by email, your details including the contact data you provide will be stored for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. We will not share this data without your consent.
datenschutz.section_4_text_1: You have the right at any time to free information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipients, and the purpose of data processing, as well as the right to correction, blocking or deletion of this data.
datenschutz.section_4_text_2: For this and other questions on the subject of personal data, you can contact us at any time using the contact details provided in the legal notice.
